experience1.title: Studio Zerance
experience1.subtitle: Shopify Developer
experience1.description:
Joined Studio Zerance as an intern, continued as a work-study student, and grew into a full-time Shopify Developer, working on multiple client projects, building custom themes, implementing advanced Liquid features, and supporting end-to-end e-commerce builds.

Location: Paris, France

experience2.title: Axome
experience2.subtitle: Shopify Developer
experience2.description:
Worked as a Shopify Developer within a digital agency, contributing to multiple client projects, driving technical decisions, and building custom Shopify solutions in collaboration with designers and project managers. Involved in end-to-end delivery, from technical scoping to production release.
Continued working with Axome following the acquisition of Studio Zerance in november 2022, with my contract officially transferred to Axome in june 2025.

Location: Paris, France / Saint-Ã‰tienne, France

experience3.title: Michino Paris
experience3.subtitle: Shopify Developer
experience3.description:
Solely responsible for the ongoing development and maintenance of three Shopify Plus stores for a high-end luxury brand, handling performance optimization, custom feature development, and internationalization across multiple markets.

Location: Paris, France

education2.title: Alliance FranÃ§aise

education2.description:
Intensive French language training at Alliance FranÃ§aise, progressing from A1 to B2 proficiency.

education3.title: HETIC
education3.subtitle: Bachelor's degree - Web development
education3.description:
Studied web development at HETIC with a broad curriculum including front-end, back-end, UX/UI design, cloud technologies, and game development. Developed a strong specialization in front-end development, complemented by a 3-month internship and 2 years of work-study at Studio Zerance.

Professional title : Digital Solutions Designer & Developer

Location: Montreuil, France

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: I have worked on more than 100 projects. These are some of my favorites.

project1.title: Franklin
project1.description: Contributed to the development and evolution of a large Shopify store, implementing new features, redesigning key UX elements such as the sidecart, and maintaining the platform over several years in collaboration with another developer.
project1.company: I worked on this project at Studio Zerance

project2.title: Terre de bougies
project2.description: Participated in the end-to-end development of a Shopify store from scratch within a team of three developers. Built key pages such as the product page and implemented custom features, including a calculator to support complex user flows.
project2.company: I worked on this project at Axome

project3.title: Inlissa
project3.description: Solely responsible for customizing and extending a pre-built Shopify theme, reworking existing sections and developing new custom sections such as an advanced "Ingredients" block on the product page, with a strong focus on web performance.
project3.company: I worked on this project at Studio Zerance

project4.title: Novoma
project4.description: Contributed to the development of a complex in-house Shopify theme alongside another developer. Took ownership of key pages, including the homepage, and participated in the overall architecture and implementation.
project4.company: I worked on this project at Axome

project5.title: l'Alchimiste
project5.description: Solely responsible for customizing and extending a pre-built Shopify theme. Reworked existing sections and developed custom features, including product suggestions in the sidecart, to improve UX and conversion.
project5.company: I worked on this project at Studio Zerance

project6.title: Plaq
project6.description: Joined the project in the middle of the development and contributed to multiple pages and sections. Implemented custom features such as gift suggestions in the sidecart and the test page to guide customers toward the right product.
project6.company: I worked on this project at Studio Zerance

project7.title: Cairn
project7.description: Built a Shopify store from scratch independently by duplicating an existing project (on which I also worked on). Adapted the structure, components, and styling to fully match new brand guidelines and functional requirements.
project7.company: I worked on this project at Axome
